verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Tell<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H5144>separate<s%> themselves from the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which they make <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H2490>me,<s%> and that they not profane my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H559>"Tell<s%> <S%H2233>them,<s%> 'If anyone of all your seed throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> approaches the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> make <S%H6942>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> having his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> on <S%H5315>him,<s%> that soul shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from before <S%H3068>me.<s%> I am Yahweh.

<S%H2233><s%>"'Whoever of the seed of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> is a <S%H6879>leper<s%> or has an <S%H2100>issue;<s%> he shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> until he is <S%H2891>clean.<s%> Whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> anything that is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> or a <S%H376>man<s%> whose <S%H2233>seed<s%> goes from <S%H3318>him;<s%>

or <S%H376>whoever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> any creeping <S%H8318>thing,<s%> whereby he may be made <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> or a <S%H120>man<s%> of whom he may take <S%H2930>uncleanness,<s%> whatever uncleanness he <S%H2932>has;<s%>

the <S%H5315>person<s%> that touches any such shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> <S%H518>unless<s%> he <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in <S%H4325>water.<s%>
When the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down,<s%> he shall be <S%H2891>clean;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> because it is his bread.
That which dies of <S%H5038>itself,<s%> or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> by <S%H398>animals,<s%> he shall not eat, defiling himself by <S%H3068>it.<s%> I am Yahweh.

<S%H5375><s%>"'They shall therefore follow my requirements, lest they bear <S%H2399>sin<s%> for <S%H4191>it,<s%> and die <S%H2490>therein,<s%> if they profane <S%H3068>it.<s%> I am Yahweh who sanctifies <S%H6942>them.<s%>

<S%H2114><s%>"'No stranger shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing:<s%> a <S%H2114>foreigner<s%> living with the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> or a hired <S%H7916>servant,<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing.<s%>

But if a <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7069>buys<s%> a <S%H3701>slave,<s%> purchased by his money, he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3211>it;<s%> and such as are born in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> they shall eat of his <S%H398>bread.<s%>
If a <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> is married to an <S%H398>outsider,<s%> she shall not eat of the heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things.<s%>

But if a <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> is a <S%H490>widow,<s%> or <S%H1644>divorced,<s%> and has no <S%H2233>child,<s%> and has <S%H7725>returned<s%> to her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> as in her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> she may <S%H398>eat<s%> of her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H2114>bread:<s%> but no stranger shall eat any of <S%H398>it.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H6944>something<s%> holy <S%H7684>unwittingly,<s%> then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of its value to <S%H5414>it,<s%> and shall give the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>
The priests shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which they <S%H7311>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

and so cause them to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> that brings <S%H819>guilt,<s%> when they <S%H398>eat<s%> their holy <S%H6944>things:<s%> for I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who sanctifies <S%H6942>them.<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H376>them,<s%> 'Whoever is of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>foreigners<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H7126>offers<s%> his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> whether it be any of their <S%H5088>vows,<s%> or any of their freewill <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> which they <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%>
that you may be <S%H7522>accepted,<s%> you shall offer a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> of the <S%H1241>bulls,<s%> of the <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or of the <S%H5795>goats.<s%>
But whatever has a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> that you shall not <S%H7126>offer:<s%> for it shall not be acceptable for <S%H7522>you.<s%>

<S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H7126>offers<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> or for a freewill <S%H5071>offering,<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd<s%> or of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> it shall be <S%H8549>perfect<s%> to be <S%H7522>accepted;<s%> no blemish shall be <S%H3971>therein.<s%>

<S%H5788>Blind,<s%> <S%H2782>injured,<s%> <S%H2782>maimed,<s%> having a <S%H3217>wart,<s%> <S%H1618>festering,<s%> or having a running <S%H2990>sore,<s%> you shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> these to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> nor <S%H5414>make<s%> an offering by <S%H801>fire<s%> of them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Either a <S%H7794>bull<s%> or a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> that has any <S%H8311>deformity<s%> or lacking in his <S%H7038>parts,<s%> that you may <S%H6213>offer<s%> for a freewill <S%H5071>offering;<s%> but for a <S%H5088>vow<s%> it shall not be <S%H7521>accepted.<s%>

That which has its testicles <S%H4600>bruised,<s%> <S%H3807>crushed,<s%> <S%H5423>broken,<s%> or <S%H3772>cut,<s%> you shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> neither shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> thus in your <S%H776>land.<s%>

Neither shall you <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H5236>foreigner<s%> of any of <S%H4893>these;<s%> because their corruption is in <S%H3971>them.<s%> There is a blemish in <S%H7521>them.<s%> They shall not be accepted for you.'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"When a <S%H7794>bull,<s%> or a <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or a <S%H5795>goat,<s%> is <S%H7651>born,<s%> then it shall remain seven <S%H3117>days<s%> with its <S%H517>mother;<s%> and from the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H1973>thenceforth<s%> it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of an <S%H7133>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Whether it is a <S%H7794>cow<s%> or <S%H7716>ewe,<s%> you shall not <S%H7819>kill<s%> it and its <S%H1121>young<s%> both in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
"When you <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you shall <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> it so that you may be <S%H7522>accepted.<s%>
It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> on the same <S%H3117>day;<s%> you shall <S%H3498>leave<s%> none of it until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
"Therefore you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>them.<s%> I am Yahweh.

You shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> but I will be made <S%H6942>holy<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who makes you <S%H6942>holy,<s%>
who brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be your <S%H430>God.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
